entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bissett

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
